entry.title: TIM Workshop
entry.content:
Magellium attends the DGA TIM workshop to show its recent works related with semantic segmentation. These works include automatic building footprint extraction, automatic land cover classification from simulated Sentinel-2 images, ship detection (on behalf an undisclosed customer), handwritten digits recognition from 18th-19th century maps and on-going works on cloud and vehicle detection.

The technologies involved are TensorFlow, Keras, Deeplearning4j, GDAL, OpenCV, docker and Google Cloud Platform.
entry.summary: Magellium attends the DGA TIM workshop to show its recent works related with semantic segmentation.
